description: Source file for API client functions in a frontend project, providing methods to interact with backend endpoints for students, exams, subjects, marks, and reports, with support for client-only mode when backend is not configured.

methods.name: buildUrl(path = '')
methods.description: Constructs a full URL from a given path, using baseUrl from config if available.

methods.name: request(path, options = {})
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request to the constructed URL with specified options and returns the response body, handling JSON or text content types.

methods.name: healthCheck()
methods.description: Checks the health of the backend API; returns a message if baseUrl is not configured.

methods.name: listStudents
methods.description: Fetches the list of students from backend or returns empty in client-only mode.

methods.name: createStudent
methods.description: Creates a new student via backend or returns payload with temporary id in client-only mode.

methods.name: updateStudent
methods.description: Updates student information via backend or returns merged object in client-only mode.

methods.name: deleteStudent
methods.description: Deletes a student via backend or returns success status in client-only mode.

methods.name: listExams
methods.description: Fetches list of exams from backend or returns empty in client-only mode.

methods.name: createExam
methods.description: Creates a new exam record via backend or returns payload with temporary id in client-only mode.

methods.name: updateExam
methods.description: Updates exam data via backend or returns payload merged with id in client-only mode.

methods.name: deleteExam
methods.description: Deletes an exam via backend or returns success in client-only mode.

methods.name: listSubjects
methods.description: Fetches list of subjects from backend or returns default list in client-only mode.

methods.name: listStudentsForClassSection
methods.description: Fetches students for a specific class and section or returns empty in client-only mode.

methods.name: listMarks
methods.description: Fetches marks for a specific exam, class, and section or returns empty in client-only mode.

methods.name: upsertMarks
methods.description: Creates or updates marks entries; in client-only mode, returns payload with temporary ids.

methods.name: deleteMark
methods.description: Deletes a mark record via backend or returns success in client-only mode.

methods.name: getStudentReport
methods.description: Fetches student report data or returns a default report object in client-only mode.

ctags.name: path
ctags.pattern: /^      const path = api.academics.endpoints.listMarks({ examId, klass, section });$/
